title: King Lear
creator_credit: Peter Brook, Michael Birkeit, Columbia, Martin Ransohoff Productions and Royal Shakespeare Company
brief_description: This Shakespearian tragedy tells the tale of woe when an old king decides to divide his kingdom amongst his daughters. Directed by Peter Brook and starring Paul Scofield and Irene Worth.
